divs: Sighting Detailsi was taking my 34 yr old son fishing for his birthday . we were heading north on the indian river when we saw it heading east . it was as bright as an arc welding light and appeared for just a few secs and disappeared just as fast as it appeared . in clear sky several miles from nearest cloud .it was moving quite fast, maybe 2x as fast as commercial airplane at similar altitude . i felt surprised but not alarmed . my family over the years have witnessed quite a lot of strange sights , nothing as elaborate as close encounters but still pretty amazing . i had a second sighting from my front yard in june of this year at 1230 pm . it appeared opaque and very high in the sky . at first i thought it may be a weather balloon , but it zig zagged several times then complewtely changed direction back to where it was 1st seen . the week after i saw it again in same place making same maneuvers and going out of sight just like week before
